scripts.build: cp -f web/index_build.html build/web/index.html && cp -f web/manifest.json build/web/manifest.json && cp -f web/background.js build/web/background.js && cp -fr web/res build/web && cat --compilation_level WHITESPACE_ONLY --js_output_file build/spacewar.min.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/* && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p build/web && mkdir -p build/lib
scripts.closure: npm run transpile && tools/convert && java -jar tools/plovr.jar build config.js
scripts.deploy: cp -rf web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -rf web/src ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/main.js ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/project.json ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
scripts.preandroid: npm run predeploy && npm run transpile && npm run resources && cp -fr web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
